Reuben's Calculators
AboutThe Calculators

B(E2) &harr; &beta; Calculator

For the purpose of converting B(E2) to quadrupole deformation parameter β (and vice versa)
While every precaution has been taken, there may be bugs. So, check first with known values
B(E2) is the reduced transition probability of an E2 transition, β comes from the eccentricity
of an ellipse when describing the axial deformation of a nucleus


Mass_Number (A):

Proton Number (Z):

Input:




Output:

A collection of some useful calculators - mostly aimed at use in experimental nuclear structure research
